text: Dominik Märki (born 9 October 1990) is a Swiss-American curler, currently living in Fayetteville, Arkansas. He competed in the 2018 Winter Olympics, where he won a bronze medal as alternate for the Swiss team. At his first United States National Championship in 2020, Märki skipped his team to a fourth place finish. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Swiss male curlers Category:Olympic curlers of Switzerland Category:Curlers at the 2018 Winter Olympics Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Switzerland Category:Medalists at the 2018 Winter Olympics Category:Olympic medalists in curling Category:Sportspeople from Bern Category:Sportspeople from Fayetteville, Arkansas Category:Swiss emigrants to the United States
title: Dominik Märki
